General.Name: Centranic Group Plc
General.Description: CentralNic Group Plc provides domain name services worldwide. It operates through Online Presence and Online Marketing segments. The Online Presence segment provides tools for businesses to go online, such as reseller, registry operator, registry service provider, retail, and computer software channels, as well as strategic consultancy and related services. The Online Marketing segment offers advertising placement services for domain name owners, content website operators, and e-commerce website operators. It also sells domain names to registrants. CentralNic Group Plc was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Saddlers House, London, United Kingdom, EC2V 6BR
